DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To establish maintain database clinical material ( i.e. , blood , urine , tissue ) information patient primary systemic amyloidosis . OUTLINE : Blood , urine , tissue , bone marrow sample collect standard laboratory evaluation maintain repository biospecimens Gerry Amyloid Research Laboratory , permit correlation clinical result measure biological event , future research study . Bone marrow RNA sample examine immunoglobulin light-chain gene sequence amino acid PCR positional cloning . Blood serum urine sample evaluate amyloid protein stability high-resolution calorimetry , isothermal-titration calorimetry , far- near-UV circular dichroism fluorescence spectroscopy . Urine sample also examine post-translational modification ( e.g. , glycosylation , sulfation , cross-linking ) identify common feature unique amyloid protein . Tissue sample analyze biochemical biophysical property post-translational modification light chain . Quality life assess SF36 questionnaire .
